computing_environment:
Linux (Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.4)
Mac OS X (darwin x86_64 m64)
data_usage: The observed threshold value for days with a maximum daily temperature above the 98th percentile for 1971-2000 was plotted for the U.S. Great Plains.
methodology:
1. At each grid point, the threshold value for days with a maximum daily temperature above the 98th percentile was calculated for each year (provided data were available for 95% of the days at that grid point).
2. At each grid point, the mean threshold daily maximum temperature was computed for the period 1971-2000.
3. Data were plotted for all grid points in the U.S. Great Plains.
